articles.description: Comet SOHO-5008 was discovered hours before April 8's total solar eclipse and imaged during the darkness of totality.
articles.content: Petr Horálek, from the Institute of Physics in Opava, was in Mexico for the eclipse. The clouds ... [+] cleared and Petr could take this beautiful shot of the Suns awe-inspiring corona. Hidden within… [+3191 chars]

articles.title: AI Starts to Sift Through String Theory’s Near-Endless Possibilities - Quanta Magazine
articles.description: Using machine learning, string theorists are finally showing how microscopic configurations of extra dimensions translate into sets of elementary particles — though not yet those of our universe.
articles.content: Ruehle and collaborators took up the old problem of approximating Calabi-Yau metrics. Anderson and others also revitalized their earlier attempts to overcome step 2. The physicists found that neural … [+8435 chars]
